data.question: What is the role of pyrimidine in the structure of [Cu(pyrimidine)2]BF4?
data.answer: Pyrimidine acts as a nonchelating, bent bridging ligand that connects tetrahedral copper(1) centers.

data.question: What is the significance of the distorted tetrahedra in the structure?
